text:
This will change how you see AI forever. 

ChatGPT gets most of its facts from... Reddit.

Let that sink in.

A new study from Semrush in June 2025 shows where AI gets its facts.

✦ Reddit makes up 40.1% of all citations.
✦ Wikipedia is next at 26.3%.
✦ Youtube and Google follow close behind.

When you ask ChatGPT for an answer, you’re getting a mix of internet debates, community posts, and crowd-sourced knowledge.

So people on Reddit & their debate shapes ChatGPT, which then shapes the rest? Sounds risky.
